CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE(Comments__c, "Multiple DPI addresses found, please validate the address manually", "/resource/yellow", "Invalid DPI Address;", "/resource/red", "Invalid DSAT Address;", "/resource/red", "Invalid DPI Address; Invalid DSAT Address;", "/resource/red", "Invalid DSAT ID;", "/resource/red", if(AND(Comments__c=='', DPI_Qualified__c , DSAT_Qualified__c ),"/resource/green","/resource/White")), '', 22, 22)
CustomField.label: Addr Validation Result
